scripts.build: npm run build-icons && npm run build-app && npm run build-staticfix
scripts.build-staticfix: mkdir -p ./dist && rm -f ./dist/200.html && ln -s index.html ./dist/200.html && rm -f ./dist/manifest.json && cp ./manifest.json ./dist/manifest.json && rm -f ./dist/favicon.ico && cp ./favicon.ico ./dist/favicon.ico && rm -f ./dist/CNAME && cp ./CNAME ./dist/CNAME && rm -f ./dist/.surgeignore && cp ./.surgeignore ./dist/.surgeignore
scripts.publish-test: npm run test && npm run build && surge -p ./dist -d stef-test.surge.sh
